about.name: Jeddah
about.info_text: Jeddah is a vibrant and diverse city located on the Red Sea coast of Saudi Arabia. It is the largest city in the Makkah Province and serves as a significant economic and cultural hub. Known for its historic old town, modern skyscrapers, and beautiful coastline, Jeddah offers a mix of tradition and progress. Visitors can explore its rich cultural heritage, indulge in shopping and dining experiences, and enjoy the stunning seaside views.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 3.5 million
Province: Makkah
Time Zone: Arabian Standard Time (UTC+03:00)
Language: Arabic
Currency: Saudi Riyal (SAR)
about.climate_text: Jeddah has a desert climate with hot and arid conditions year-round. Winters are mild, and summers can be extremely hot. The city's proximity to the Red Sea moderates its temperatures and provides opportunities for water-based activities.

attractions_card.title: Al-Balad (Historic Jeddah)
attractions_card.description: Al-Balad is the historic district of Jeddah, known for its traditional coral stone buildings, narrow alleyways, and historic souks. It offers a glimpse into the city's past.

attractions_card.title: King Fahd Fountain
attractions_card.description: The King Fahd Fountain is one of the world's tallest fountains, reaching impressive heights on the Jeddah Corniche and providing a captivating evening display.

attractions_card.title: Corniche
attractions_card.description: The Jeddah Corniche is a picturesque seaside promenade with beautiful views of the Red Sea, parks, sculptures, and recreational areas for families and visitors.

attractions_card.title: Red Sea Mall
attractions_card.description: Red Sea Mall is a modern shopping and entertainment complex, offering a wide range of retail stores, dining options, and family-friendly attractions.

attractions_card.title: Atallah Happy Land Park
attractions_card.description: Atallah Happy Land Park is a popular amusement park in Jeddah, featuring thrilling rides, entertainment, and activities for all ages.

attractions_card.alt: Al-Jalad Museum of Archaeology and Ethnography
attractions_card.title: Al-Jalad Museum of Archaeology and Ethnography
attractions_card.description: This museum showcases artifacts and exhibits related to Saudi Arabia's history, culture, and archaeology, providing valuable insights into the region's heritage.

attractions_card.title: Floating Mosque (Masjid Al Rahma)
attractions_card.description: The Floating Mosque is a unique architectural marvel located on the Red Sea, accessible by a causeway. It is a serene place of worship and a stunning sight.

attractions_card.title: Jeddah Waterfront
attractions_card.description: The Jeddah Waterfront is a recently developed area along the Red Sea, offering modern amenities, parks, and a range of leisure and recreational activities.

food_card.title: Mandi
food_card.description: Mandi is a traditional Saudi Arabian dish consisting of fragrant rice and tender meat, often flavored with a blend of aromatic spices and herbs.

food_card.title: Kabsa
food_card.description: Kabsa is another beloved Saudi dish, featuring seasoned rice with a mix of meats and garnished with nuts, raisins, and a special blend of spices.

food_card.title: Shawarma
food_card.description: Shawarma is a popular street food in Jeddah, consisting of thinly sliced marinated meat wrapped in flatbread and served with various condiments.

food_card.title: Arabic Coffee (Gahwa) and Dates
food_card.description: Arabic coffee, known as Gahwa, is a traditional beverage often served with dates as a sign of hospitality in Saudi culture.

food_card.title: Jareesh
food_card.description: Jareesh is a Saudi dish made from crushed and fermented wheat, typically cooked with meat and served as a hearty dish.

hotels_card.title: Jeddah Hilton Hotel
hotels_card.description: Jeddah Hilton Hotel offers luxurious accommodations with stunning views, a range of dining options, and world-class amenities.

hotels_card.title: Mövenpick Hotel City Star Jeddah
hotels_card.description: Mövenpick Hotel City Star is a modern and elegant hotel in the heart of Jeddah, featuring comfortable rooms and exceptional dining.

hotels_card.title: Rosewood Jeddah
hotels_card.description: Rosewood Jeddah offers a blend of contemporary design and luxury, with a prime location and impeccable service.

hotels_card.title: InterContinental Jeddah
hotels_card.description: InterContinental Jeddah is a well-known hotel offering spacious rooms, dining options, and easy access to the city's attractions.

transport_card.title: King Abdulaziz International Airport
transport_card.description: King Abdulaziz International Airport (JED) is the primary international gateway to Jeddah, providing both domestic and international flights.

transport_card.title: Jeddah Metro
transport_card.description: Jeddah is developing a new metro system that will provide efficient transportation throughout the city.

transport_card.title: Taxis and Ride-Sharing
transport_card.description: Taxis and ride-sharing services are readily available for getting around Jeddah, providing convenient and accessible transportation.
